name: GRAV-BLASTER
description:
Made for Brackeys 2020.1 Game Jam - Stronger Together

Place black holes to guide asteroids into your crosshairs and blast them away! Group them closer together to exert a stronger pull on the targets.

Play in browser fullscreen, or download!

I have more game mechanics planned but not enough time to implement before the end of the jam.

  • Anti-gravity repulsors
  • Multiple target objects
  • ... and others

Hopefully I can get to them later on after the jam ends.
